channel.title: Angular on Joan Perals — UX Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Angular on Joan Perals — UX Developer

item.description: In 2012 I joined a small team of talented and innovative folks at the Interaction Design Studios (IXDS) in Berlin.

item.title: Doodlescript
item.description: How would computer programming look like if we could reinvent it now from the ground up? With this project I wanted to radically question the way we program.
